text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Phew… Alright. 
My last goal… Until the end, I need to… Stay motivated!
Cheval Grand was earnestly and tirelessly completing her training menu for the day.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…I'm such a scaredy cat… 
How could I ever become the greatest uma musume…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Ever since the beginning, I-I've never been good at anything! 
…Me getting in here was nothing more than a fluke, so that's why——
Looking back, she has changed a lot since then. Back then, she'd consult me nervously and timidly, but now—

text_block_list.name: Stern Faced Trainer
text_block_list.text: Not bad at all. Although I think tomorrow I'll draw up a slightly different menu for you.

text_block_list.name: An Honest Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ah, please wait a second. Before you go, I'd like to ask you something. I feel as though I still lack action plans for some situations… So I'd…
…I don't think she's at that level just yet, but compared to before she's a lot less reserved when it comes to asking for advice or asking a question.
I feel as though my assigned uma musume is slowly, but surely, improving. I feel warm on the inside with that thought in mind.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
T-Trainer? 
…Um, did something happen?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Ah! I-is it perhaps, my running? 
D-did I mess up my form?? Did I not follow the menu correctly?
Even when you gave up your precious time to make it… I'm sorry! I'll work even harder than before!
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: B-but it is! There's still so much that I can't do, of course there are things worrying me, that's why…
After I calmed down the panicking Cheval, I told her I was just remembering the time when we first met.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …I… see.
(Even if they say they were just recalling the moment when we first met, I still feel as though there's something troubling them…)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: That has to be it… In the first place, they weren't recalling anything… They were…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (At that time, they saw something… something about another uma musume who was training.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (That girl was, like everyone else, was talking with her trainer perfectly fine…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Ah!? I-it has to be…
(That girl looked dead set on her goals, and was overflowing with motivation… Trainer must've noticed how she was able to convey her opinions in a straightforward manner.)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Then they must've compared to how much I haven't changed and thought… I'm extremely pathetic!?
(They're someone who is able to find the strong points of people, even in someone like me—)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: (…I accepted my invitation after I chose them. It's obvious that someone like me is nothing more than a waste of time for them!)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: If that's the case, won't they… get fed up with me? The me that can't take that first step? No, something like that… can't…
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: (…They might just be putting up with me, just because they're nice…)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: (What do I do? What can I do?…Uuuu…)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I'm so confused… a-anyways… 
I need to work harder than before, before they get fed up with me.

After all they are… 
My one chance… my only hope!
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
